topics.body:
"Mozart is shit. His autistic use of sonata-allegro is generic and repetitive as fuck; all of his pieces are boring and diatonic, mostly in happy major keys devoid of feeling or deeper meaning; and his music caters to the parties of both privileged aristocrats and the foul mouthed, loathsome bourgeoisie. Moreover, his pieces are extremely limited in terms of timbre; the Classical era faced a huge bottleneck in timbre compared to the Baroque and Romantic." - anon

only on /mu/ people would say mozart is shit.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d16fb86368726caa9d0000#post_53d16fb86368726caa9d0000
Well if your feeling "poppy" I'd recommend  "Freely Tomorrow":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LILbGTlyaXo

If you want something a little creepy the  "A Full Course for Candy Addicts":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hXDSVpm3KPI

If your looking for some feels then "Seaholly":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=knMBk2PxS98

For those eclectic times Then look no further than "Botnical Garden":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HAg_jdl3_Do

And if you feel like dancing then "Party Junkie":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mFhdHBYAuwE is your best bet.

One of my personal favorites is "Karakuri Pierrot":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K2yo9CFd8MA
